abstract: Wall Street ended mixed Friday, with gains led by the energy sector and losses led by financial shares.
snippet: Wall Street ended mixed Friday, with gains led by the energy sector and losses led by financial shares.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street ended mixed Friday, with gains led by the energy sector and losses led by financial shares.

headline.main: Market Mixed as Energy Gains and Financials Fall
headline.print_headline: A Mixed Market as Energy Gains and Financials Fall
